name: @ledgerhq/hw-transport-http
description: Ledger Hardware Wallet communication layer over http

scripts.build: cd ../.. && export PATH=$(yarn bin):$PATH && cd - && babel --source-maps -d lib src && flow-copy-source -v src lib
scripts.watch: cd ../.. && export PATH=$(yarn bin):$PATH && cd - && babel --watch --source-maps -d lib src & flow-copy-source -w -v src lib
